transcript: I'll never forgive you. Why did you wait all these years? All I've done is sit around and wonder if I was crazy for thinking of you.

segments.text: I'll never forgive you. Why did you wait all these years? All I've done is sit around and wonder if I was crazy for thinking of you.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I'll never forgive you.  Why did you wait all these years?  All I've done is sit around and wonder if I was crazy for thinking of you.
